availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Graves James (President, The Agricultural Deposit Bank, Lexington, KY)

body.p: Son of Daniel James and Nancy Ann Graves. Married Anna Skinner. Father of David Hunt James. Unanimously elected president of the Agricultural Deposit Bank of Lexington, Kentucky, November 1856.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for John Graves James (1797-1874), Find A Grave Memorial # 98876673, Lexington Cemetery, Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, ttps://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bi98876673n/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=james&GSfn=john&GSmn=g&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=98876673&df=all& (accessed 8 Aug 2017).
